attributes.action: Re-introduce grants to help pay for fuel conversions to lpg in vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The grant system has been withdrawn and this means a bill of over £2000 for the average motorist to convert their gas guzzling vehicle to run on "green" lpg,  hardly an incentive to go green.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
